channel.title: [Tut] Auto on two or even moore accounts using SCAR
channel.description:
Version 1.0: Tut/Guide made. Version 1.1: Checking sppellgin, and changing tut. Version 1.2 Since loads of ppls have been adding my msn and asked me about "Virtual", i have decided to make it moore "user-friendly", i will try to add a video, but don't expect this to be updated fast, ill do my best, k?http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=379 noob You can still add my MSN, if you want ill help everyone i can
Well first of all you need Virual PC 2004 it can be found via HTTP here:
http://dxdforum.com/showthread.php?t=54237
Note: I had to post a link to this warez forum, because i think its against the rules to post warez here. If you see any porn, trojans, keyloggers or just if the forum is to ugly for you please report this to me, it was pretty clean when i linked it
1. Download Daemon Tools here: http://www.daemon-tools.cc/dtcc/download.php?mode=Download&id=81 2. Install it, just click next etc, it will ask you to restart do this. 3. Now click on Daemon Tools icon on your desktop. 4. Look for this icon:
[img]http://img355.imageshack.us/img355/5418/namnlsskit2bh.jpg[/img]
Right click this, than: Virtual CD/DVD-ROM------> Device0:----------> Mount image -----> Than browse for the map you got the Virtual pc in, select jgt-msvpc2k4.cue and click open.
Now the setup should run, if not try to run it manually by clicking on auto start (located on the virtual CD, in My Computer) or something smiliar.
After the setup is done, open Microsoft Virtual PC 2004 and follow the wizard ( create a new virtual drive), If you want to follow my recommended guide select Windows 98 as OS, adjust the ram to 128mb if you got 256mb ram and 256 if you got 512 etc.
After that just leave it or close it, now you need an Win 98 ISO image it can be found via bittorent:
My suggested torrent: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3514038/Windows_98_Second_Edition_English___DirectX9.0c___Unofficial_Ser
Via Bittorent: Search if you want your home lang: www.thepiratebay.org www.mininova.org www.torrentspy.com www.isohunt.com OR Via FTP:
Via FTP: Search http://www.files.lt/ i didnt found much use bittorent instead.
Dont know how to use/download a torrent? www.thepiratebay.org click on how to download. If you are smart enough just download utorrent (www.utorrent.com). slyck.com for moore clients. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Well when the iso is down do the capture iso thingy: CD -----> capture iso image, locate the iso and click open. Now click Action ----> reset, it will ask you something, just click reset! Now the Setup should begin. When the setup is done download scar and the scripts you want and start autoing.! (do this in Virtual PC 2004, not in your originally os, lol)
Yay you are ready.
Bored of windows? ( this is not recommended by me, this will only work on very fast comps Mac: http://static.thepiratebay.org/downloadtorrent/3451287.torrent/Mac_OS_X_10.4.4_5_osx86_Patched_Bootable_DVD.3451287.TPB.torrent Linux/Unix/Solaris 10: http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3347130
Search piratebay for your favorite os: www.thepiratebay.org
Post any errors and problems, i will try to answer you.
Edit: i will update the win 98 download soon.... just hang on!

item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

mjordan:

@The Un-Named, what do you mean virtual server? And how exactly does this work; im guessing I cant minimize it and still auto since SCAR is a color clicker? Once i get this installed, how will it look, will it be like i just have another window open?

Basically this guide tells you how to install a computer on your computer(thus giving 1 pc 2 pc’s) but it is very poorly written and 2 pc’s lag A LOT.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Here’s what I did, download virtual server 2004, click new, bla bla just click ok on all, then on CD use physical drive(assuming you have a windows xp disc in) and just use windows xp. To fix lag, put both the host pc and the virtual pc in win98 skins.
